12 namespace voxblox {
13 
16 template <typename VoxelType>
17 class Block {
18  public:
19  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
20 
21  typedef std::shared_ptr<Block<VoxelType> > Ptr;
22  typedef std::shared_ptr<const Block<VoxelType> > ConstPtr;
23 
24  Block(size_t voxels_per_side, FloatingPoint voxel_size, const Point& origin)
25  : has_data_(false),
26  voxels_per_side_(voxels_per_side),
27  voxel_size_(voxel_size),
28  origin_(origin),
29  updated_(false) {
30  num_voxels_ = voxels_per_side_ * voxels_per_side_ * voxels_per_side_;
31  voxel_size_inv_ = 1.0 / voxel_size_;
32  block_size_ = voxels_per_side_ * voxel_size_;
33  block_size_inv_ = 1.0 / block_size_;
34  voxels_.reset(new VoxelType[num_voxels_]);
35  }
36 
37  explicit Block(const BlockProto& proto);
38 
39  ~Block() {}
40 
41  // Index calculations.
42  inline size_t computeLinearIndexFromVoxelIndex(
43  const VoxelIndex& index) const {
44  size_t linear_index = static_cast<size_t>(
45  index.x() +
46  voxels_per_side_ * (index.y() + index.z() * voxels_per_side_));
47 
48  DCHECK(index.x() >= 0 && index.x() < static_cast<int>(voxels_per_side_));
49  DCHECK(index.y() >= 0 && index.y() < static_cast<int>(voxels_per_side_));
50  DCHECK(index.z() >= 0 && index.z() < static_cast<int>(voxels_per_side_));
51 
52  DCHECK_LT(linear_index,
53  voxels_per_side_ * voxels_per_side_ * voxels_per_side_);
54  DCHECK_GE(linear_index, 0u);
55  return linear_index;
56  }
57 
63  inline VoxelIndex computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(
64  const Point& coords) const {
65  const IndexElement max_value = voxels_per_side_ - 1;
66  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
67  getGridIndexFromPoint<VoxelIndex>(coords - origin_, voxel_size_inv_);
68  // check is needed as getGridIndexFromPoint gives results that have a tiny
69  // chance of being outside the valid voxel range.
70  return VoxelIndex(std::max(std::min(voxel_index.x(), max_value), 0),
71  std::max(std::min(voxel_index.y(), max_value), 0),
72  std::max(std::min(voxel_index.z(), max_value), 0));
73  }
74 
82  inline VoxelIndex computeVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(
83  const Point& coords) const {
84  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
85  getGridIndexFromPoint<VoxelIndex>(coords - origin_, voxel_size_inv_);
86  return voxel_index;
87  }
88 
95  inline size_t computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(const Point& coords) const {
96  return computeLinearIndexFromVoxelIndex(
97  computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
98  }
99 
101  inline Point computeCoordinatesFromLinearIndex(size_t linear_index) const {
102  return computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(
103  computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(linear_index));
104  }
105 
107  inline Point computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(const VoxelIndex& index) const {
108  return origin_ + getCenterPointFromGridIndex(index, voxel_size_);
109  }
110 
111  inline VoxelIndex computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(
112  size_t linear_index) const {
113  int rem = linear_index;
114  VoxelIndex result;
115  std::div_t div_temp = std::div(rem, voxels_per_side_ * voxels_per_side_);
116  rem = div_temp.rem;
117  result.z() = div_temp.quot;
118  div_temp = std::div(rem, voxels_per_side_);
119  result.y() = div_temp.quot;
120  result.x() = div_temp.rem;
121  return result;
122  }
123 
125  inline const VoxelType& getVoxelByLinearIndex(size_t index) const {
126  return voxels_[index];
127  }
128 
129  inline const VoxelType& getVoxelByVoxelIndex(const VoxelIndex& index) const {
130  return voxels_[computeLinearIndexFromVoxelIndex(index)];
131  }
132 
139  inline const VoxelType& getVoxelByCoordinates(const Point& coords) const {
140  return voxels_[computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(coords)];
141  }
142 
149  inline VoxelType& getVoxelByCoordinates(const Point& coords) {
150  return voxels_[computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(coords)];
151  }
152 
159  inline VoxelType* getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(const Point& coords) {
160  return &voxels_[computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(coords)];
161  }
162 
163  inline const VoxelType* getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(const Point& coords) const {
164  return &voxels_[computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(coords)];
165  }
166 
167  inline VoxelType& getVoxelByLinearIndex(size_t index) {
168  DCHECK_LT(index, num_voxels_);
169  return voxels_[index];
170  }
171 
172  inline VoxelType& getVoxelByVoxelIndex(const VoxelIndex& index) {
173  return voxels_[computeLinearIndexFromVoxelIndex(index)];
174  }
175 
176  inline bool isValidVoxelIndex(const VoxelIndex& index) const {
177  if (index.x() < 0 ||
178  index.x() >= static_cast<IndexElement>(voxels_per_side_)) {
179  return false;
180  }
181  if (index.y() < 0 ||
182  index.y() >= static_cast<IndexElement>(voxels_per_side_)) {
183  return false;
184  }
185  if (index.z() < 0 ||
186  index.z() >= static_cast<IndexElement>(voxels_per_side_)) {
187  return false;
188  }
189  return true;
190  }
191 
192  inline bool isValidLinearIndex(size_t index) const {
193  if (index < 0 || index >= num_voxels_) {
194  return false;
195  }
196  return true;
197  }
198 
199  BlockIndex block_index() const {
200  return getGridIndexFromOriginPoint<BlockIndex>(origin_, block_size_inv_);
201  }
202 
203  // Basic function accessors.
204  size_t voxels_per_side() const { return voxels_per_side_; }
205  FloatingPoint voxel_size() const { return voxel_size_; }
206  FloatingPoint voxel_size_inv() const { return voxel_size_inv_; }
207  size_t num_voxels() const { return num_voxels_; }
208  Point origin() const { return origin_; }
209  void setOrigin(const Point& new_origin) { origin_ = new_origin; }
210  FloatingPoint block_size() const { return block_size_; }
211 
212  bool has_data() const { return has_data_; }
213  bool updated() const { return updated_; }
214 
215  std::atomic<bool>& updated() { return updated_; }
216  bool& has_data() { return has_data_; }
217 
218  void set_updated(bool updated) { updated_ = updated; }
219  void set_has_data(bool has_data) { has_data_ = has_data; }
220 
221  // Serialization.
222  void getProto(BlockProto* proto) const;
223  void serializeToIntegers(std::vector<uint32_t>* data) const;
224  void deserializeFromIntegers(const std::vector<uint32_t>& data);
225 
226  void mergeBlock(const Block<VoxelType>& other_block);
227 
228  size_t getMemorySize() const;
229 
230  protected:
231  std::unique_ptr<VoxelType[]> voxels_;
232 
233  // Derived, cached parameters.
234  size_t num_voxels_;
235 
237  bool has_data_;
238 
239  private:
240  void deserializeProto(const BlockProto& proto);
241  void serializeProto(BlockProto* proto) const;
242 
243  // Base parameters.
244  const size_t voxels_per_side_;
245  const FloatingPoint voxel_size_;
246  Point origin_;
247 
248  // Derived, cached parameters.
249  FloatingPoint voxel_size_inv_;
250  FloatingPoint block_size_;
251  FloatingPoint block_size_inv_;
252 
254  std::atomic<bool> updated_;
255 };
